remarks: The covers relation implies no in-betweenness.  ( ~ cvnbtwn3 analog.) (Contributed by NM, 4-Nov-2011.)
statement:
cvrletr.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
cvrletr.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
cvrletr.s $e |- .< = ( lt ` K ) $.
cvrletr.c $e |- C = ( <o ` K ) $.
cvrnbtwn3 $p |- ( ( K e. Poset /\ ( X e. B /\ Y e. B /\ Z e. B ) /\ X C Y ) -> ( ( X .<_ Z /\ Z .< Y ) <-> X = Z ) ) $.
